title-group.article-title: GLOBAL SMOOTH SOLUTION CURVES USING RIGOROUS BRANCH FOLLOWING

abstract.p: In this paper, we present a new method for rigorously computing smooth branches of zeros of nonlinear operators $f\colon {\Bbb R}^{l_{1}}\times B_{1}\rightarrow {\Bbb R}^{l_{2}}\times B_{2}$ , where B₁ and B₂ are Banach spaces. The method is first introduced for parameter continuation and then generalized to pseudo-arclength continuation. Examples in the context of ordinary, partial and delay differential equations are given.
